item.title: [PI] ::Alltome command
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

hi i try adding this: if (playerCommand.startsWith("alltome")) { String name = playerCommand.substring(10); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(c.validClient(i)) c.getClient(i).getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel); } }
and get no errors after compile but when i try using the command i get this in the outprint

[1/5/11 9:24 PM]: java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -3 [1/5/11 9:24 PM]: at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) [1/5/11 9:24 PM]: at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) [1/5/11 9:24 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.Commands.processPacket(C ommands.java:532) [1/5/11 9:24 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:138) [1/5/11 9:24 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:926) [1/5/11 9:24 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:146) [1/5/11 9:24 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:151)

does anyone know the cause of this?
